member.name: T:PHP.Library.Zlib.BinaryChunkQueue
member.summary: Queue of binary chunks that can be pushed to and popped from.

member.name: F:PHP.Library.Zlib.BinaryChunkQueue._availableBytes
member.summary: Available bytes within the binary chunk queue.

member.name: F:PHP.Library.Zlib.BinaryChunkQueue._chunks
member.summary: List of chunks.

member.name: F:PHP.Library.Zlib.BinaryChunkQueue._position
member.summary: Position within the first chunk, if possible (otherwise -1).

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.BinaryChunkQueue.Push(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Pushes new chunk into the queue.
member.param: Byte array.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.BinaryChunkQueue.EnqueueByteBlock(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Pushes new chunk into the queue.
member.param: Byte array.
Offset of the valid area of the chunk.
Length of valid area of the chunk.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.BinaryChunkQueue.PushByteBlock(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Pushes new chunk into the beginning of the queue.
member.param: Byte array.
Offset of the valid area of the chunk.
Length of valid area of the chunk.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.BinaryChunkQueue.DequeueByte
member.summary: Pops a single byte from the queue, removing it in the process.
member.returns: Next byte value if there was any present, otherwise null.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.BinaryChunkQueue.PeekByte
member.summary: Peeks a single byte from the queue.
member.returns: Next byte value if there was any present, otherwise null.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.BinaryChunkQueue.DequeueByteBlock(System.Int32)
member.summary: Pops a byte block from the queue, removing it in the process.
member.param: Requested length of the block.
member.returns: Block of bytes of requested length if available, otherwise null.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.BinaryChunkQueue.SkipByteBlock(System.Int32)
member.summary: Skips the given count of bytes in the queue.
member.param: Number of bytes to skip.
member.returns: True if the given count of bytes was available, otherwise false.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.BinaryChunkQueue.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes new instance of the class.

member.name: P:PHP.Library.Zlib.BinaryChunkQueue.AvailableBytes
member.summary: Gets total available bytes within the queue.

member.name: T:PHP.Library.Zlib.BinaryChunkQueue.Chunk
member.summary: Internal representation of chunk.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.BinaryChunkQueue.Chunk.#ctor(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes new binary chunk.
member.param: Non-null reference to byte array.
Starting offset in the chunk.
Length of the valid area in the chunk.

member.summary: Byte array.

member.name: P:PHP.Library.Zlib.BinaryChunkQueue.Chunk.Offset
member.summary: Starting offset.

member.name: P:PHP.Library.Zlib.BinaryChunkQueue.Chunk.Length
member.summary: Length of the chunk.

member.name: T:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib
member.summary: Implements PHP functions provided by multi-byte-string extension.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzClose(PHP.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Closes the given gz-file pointer.
member.param: The gz-file pointer. It must be valid, and must point to a file successfully opened by gzopen().
member.returns: Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzOpen(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Opens a gzip (.gz) file for reading or writing.
member.param: The file name.
As in fopen() (rb or wb) but can also include a compression level (wb9) or a strategy: f for filtered data as in wb6f, h for Huffman only compression as in wb1h.

returns.para: Returns a file pointer to the file opened, after that, everything you read from this file descriptor will be transparently decompressed and what you write gets compressed.
If the open fails, the function returns FALSE.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzOpen(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Opens a gzip (.gz) file for reading or writing.
member.param: The file name.
As in fopen() (rb or wb) but can also include a compression level (wb9) or a strategy: f for filtered data as in wb6f, h for Huffman only compression as in wb1h.
You can set this optional parameter to 1, if you want to search for the file in the include_path too.

returns.para: Returns a file pointer to the file opened, after that, everything you read from this file descriptor will be transparently decompressed and what you write gets compressed.
If the open fails, the function returns FALSE.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzCompress(PHP.Core.PhpBytes)
member.summary: This function compresses the given string using the ZLIB data format.
member.param: The data to compress.
member.returns: The compressed string or FALSE if an error occurred.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzCompress(PHP.Core.PhpBytes,System.Int32)
member.summary: This function compress the given string using the ZLIB data format.
member.param: The data to compress.
The level of compression. Can be given as 0 for no compression up to 9 for maximum compression.
member.returns: The compressed string or FALSE if an error occurred.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzUncompress(PHP.Core.PhpBytes)
member.summary: This function uncompress a compressed string.
member.param: The data compressed by gzcompress().

returns.para: The original uncompressed data or FALSE on error.
The function will return an error if the uncompressed data is more than 32768 times the length of the compressed input data or more than the optional parameter length.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzUncompress(PHP.Core.PhpBytes,System.Int32)
member.summary: This function uncompress a compressed string.
member.param: The data compressed by gzcompress().
The maximum length of data to decode.

returns.para: The original uncompressed data or FALSE on error.
The function will return an error if the uncompressed data is more than 32768 times the length of the compressed input data or more than the optional parameter length.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.ZlibCompress(System.Byte[]@,System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Reimplements function from zlib (compress2) that is not present in ZLIB.NET.
member.param: Destination array of bytes. May be trimmed if necessary.
Source array of bytes.
Level of compression.
member.returns: Zlib status code.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.ZlibUncompress(System.Byte[]@,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Reimplements function from zlib (uncompress) that is not present in ZLIB.NET.
member.param: Destination array of bytes. May be trimmed if necessary.
Source array of bytes.
member.returns: Zlib status code.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzDeflate(PHP.Core.PhpBytes)
member.summary: This function compress the given string using the DEFLATE data format.
member.param: The data to deflate.
member.returns: The deflated string or FALSE if an error occurred.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzDeflate(PHP.Core.PhpBytes,System.Int32)
member.summary: This function compress the given string using the DEFLATE data format.
member.param: The data to deflate.
The level of compression. Can be given as 0 for no compression up to 9 for maximum compression. If not given, the default compression level will be the default compression level of the zlib library.
member.returns: The deflated string or FALSE if an error occurred.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzInflate(PHP.Core.PhpBytes)
member.summary: This function inflate a deflated string.
member.param: The data compressed by gzdeflate().

returns.para: The original uncompressed data or FALSE on error.
The function will return an error if the uncompressed data is more than 32768 times the length of the compressed input data or more than the optional parameter length.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzInflate(PHP.Core.PhpBytes,System.Int64)
member.summary: This function inflate a deflated string.
member.param: The data compressed by gzdeflate().
The maximum length of data to decode.

returns.para: The original uncompressed data or FALSE on error.
The function will return an error if the uncompressed data is more than 32768 times the length of the compressed input data or more than the optional parameter length.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzDecode(PHP.Core.PhpBytes)
member.summary: This function returns a decoded version of the input data.
member.param: The data to decode, encoded by gzencode().
member.returns: The decoded string, or FALSE if an error occurred.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzDecode(PHP.Core.PhpBytes,System.Int32)
member.summary: This function returns a decoded version of the input data.
member.param: The data to decode, encoded by gzencode().
The maximum length of data to decode.
member.returns: The decoded string, or FALSE if an error occurred.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzEncode(PHP.Core.PhpBytes)
member.summary: This function returns a compressed version of the input data compatible with the output of the gzip program.
member.param: The data to encode.
member.returns: The encoded string, or FALSE if an error occurred.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzEncode(PHP.Core.PhpBytes,System.Int32)
member.summary: This function returns a compressed version of the input data compatible with the output of the gzip program.
member.param: The data to encode.
The level of compression. Can be given as 0 for no compression up to 9 for maximum compression. If not given, the default compression level will be the default compression level of the zlib library.
member.returns: The encoded string, or FALSE if an error occurred.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzEncode(PHP.Core.PhpBytes,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This function returns a compressed version of the input data compatible with the output of the gzip program.
member.param: The data to encode.
The level of compression. Can be given as 0 for no compression up to 9 for maximum compression. If not given, the default compression level will be the default compression level of the zlib library.

param.name: encoding_mode
param.para: The encoding mode. Can be FORCE_GZIP (the default) or FORCE_DEFLATE.
If you use FORCE_DEFLATE, you get a standard zlib deflated string (inclusive zlib headers) after the gzip file header but without the trailing crc32 checksum.

member.returns: The encoded string, or FALSE if an error occurred.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzEof(PHP.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Tests the given GZ file pointer for EOF.
member.param: The gz-file pointer. It must be valid, and must point to a file successfully opened by gzopen().
member.returns: Returns TRUE if the gz-file pointer is at EOF or an error occurs; otherwise returns FALSE.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzRewind(PHP.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Sets the file position indicator of the given gz-file pointer to the beginning of the file stream.
member.param: The gz-file pointer. It must be valid, and must point to a file successfully opened by gzopen().
member.returns: Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzSeek(PHP.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32)

summary.para: Sets the file position indicator for the given file pointer to the given offset byte into the file stream. Equivalent to calling (in C) gzseek(zp, offset, SEEK_SET).

If the file is opened for reading, this function is emulated but can be extremely slow. If the file is opened for writing, only forward seeks are supported; gzseek() then compresses a sequence of zeroes up to the new starting position.

member.param: The gz-file pointer. It must be valid, and must point to a file successfully opened by gzopen().
The seeked offset.
member.returns: Upon success, returns 0; otherwise, returns -1. Note that seeking past EOF is not considered an error.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzSeek(PHP.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32,System.Int32)

summary.para: Sets the file position indicator for the given file pointer to the given offset byte into the file stream. Equivalent to calling (in C) gzseek(zp, offset, SEEK_SET).

If the file is opened for reading, this function is emulated but can be extremely slow. If the file is opened for writing, only forward seeks are supported; gzseek() then compresses a sequence of zeroes up to the new starting position.

member.param: The gz-file pointer. It must be valid, and must point to a file successfully opened by gzopen().
The seeked offset.
whence values are: SEEK_SET (relative to origin), SEEK_CUR (relative to current position).
member.returns: Upon success, returns 0; otherwise, returns -1. Note that seeking past EOF is not considered an error.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzTell(PHP.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Gets the position of the given file pointer; i.e., its offset into the uncompressed file stream.
member.param: The gz-file pointer. It must be valid, and must point to a file successfully opened by gzopen().
member.returns: The position of the file pointer or FALSE if an error occurs.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzFile(PHP.Core.ScriptContext,System.String)
member.summary: This function is identical to readgzfile(), except that it returns the file in an array.
member.param: Current script context, passed automatically by the caller.
The file name.
member.returns: An array containing the file, one line per cell.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzFile(PHP.Core.ScriptContext,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: This function is identical to readgzfile(), except that it returns the file in an array.
member.param: Current script context, passed automatically by the caller.
The file name.
You can set this optional parameter to 1, if you want to search for the file in the include_path too.
member.returns: An array containing the file, one line per cell.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzGetChar(PHP.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Returns a string containing a single (uncompressed) character read from the given gz-file pointer.
member.param: The gz-file pointer. It must be valid, and must point to a file successfully opened by gzopen().
member.returns: The uncompressed character or FALSE on EOF (unlike gzeof()).

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzGetString(PHP.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a (uncompressed) string of up to length - 1 bytes read from the given file pointer. Reading ends when length - 1 bytes have been read, on a newline, or on EOF (whichever comes first).
member.param: The gz-file pointer. It must be valid, and must point to a file successfully opened by gzopen().
The length of data to get.
member.returns: The uncompressed string, or FALSE on error.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzGetStringStripped(PHP.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32)
member.summary: Identical to gzgets(), except that gzgetss() attempts to strip any HTML and PHP tags from the text it reads.
member.param: The gz-file pointer. It must be valid, and must point to a file successfully opened by gzopen().
The length of data to get.
member.returns: The uncompressed and striped string, or FALSE on error.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzGetStringStripped(PHP.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32,PHP.Core.PhpBytes)
member.summary: Identical to gzgets(), except that gzgetss() attempts to strip any HTML and PHP tags from the text it reads.
member.param: The gz-file pointer. It must be valid, and must point to a file successfully opened by gzopen().
The length of data to get.
You can use this optional parameter to specify tags which should not be stripped.
member.returns: The uncompressed and striped string, or FALSE on error.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzPassthru(PHP.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Reads to EOF on the given gz-file pointer from the current position and writes the (uncompressed) results to standard output.
member.param: The gz-file pointer. It must be valid, and must point to a file successfully opened by gzopen().
member.returns: The number of uncompressed characters read from gz and passed through to the input, or FALSE on error.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzPutString(PHP.Core.PhpResource,PHP.Core.PhpBytes)
member.summary: This function is an alias of gzwrite(), which writes the contents of string to the given gz-file.
member.param: The gz-file pointer. It must be valid, and must point to a file successfully opened by gzopen().
The string to write.
member.returns: Returns the number of (uncompressed) bytes written to the given gz-file stream.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzPutString(PHP.Core.PhpResource,PHP.Core.PhpBytes,System.Int32)
member.summary: This function is an alias of gzwrite(), which writes the contents of string to the given gz-file.
member.param: The gz-file pointer. It must be valid, and must point to a file successfully opened by gzopen().
The string to write.
The number of uncompressed bytes to write. If supplied, writing will stop after length (uncompressed) bytes have been written or the end of string is reached, whichever comes first.
member.returns: Returns the number of (uncompressed) bytes written to the given gz-file stream.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzRead(PHP.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads up to length bytes from the given gz-file pointer. Reading stops when length (uncompressed) bytes have been read or EOF is reached, whichever comes first.
member.param: The gz-file pointer. It must be valid, and must point to a file successfully opened by gzopen().
The number of bytes to read.
member.returns: The data that have been read.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzWrite(PHP.Core.PhpResource,PHP.Core.PhpBytes)
member.summary: Writes the contents of string to the given gz-file.
member.param: The gz-file pointer. It must be valid, and must point to a file successfully opened by gzopen().
The string to write.
member.returns: Returns the number of (uncompressed) bytes written to the given gz-file stream.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.GzWrite(PHP.Core.PhpResource,PHP.Core.PhpBytes,System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes the contents of string to the given gz-file.
member.param: The gz-file pointer. It must be valid, and must point to a file successfully opened by gzopen().
The string to write.
The number of uncompressed bytes to write. If supplied, writing will stop after length (uncompressed) bytes have been written or the end of string is reached, whichever comes first.
member.returns: Returns the number of (uncompressed) bytes written to the given gz-file stream.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.ReadGzFile(System.String)
member.summary: Reads a file, decompresses it and writes it to standard output.
member.param: The file name. This file will be opened from the filesystem and its contents written to standard output.
member.returns: Returns the number of (uncompressed) bytes read from the file. If an error occurs, FALSE is returned and unless the function was called as @readgzfile, an error message is printed.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.ReadGzFile(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a file, decompresses it and writes it to standard output.
member.param: The file name. This file will be opened from the filesystem and its contents written to standard output.
You can set this optional parameter to 1, if you want to search for the file in the include_path too.
member.returns: Returns the number of (uncompressed) bytes read from the file. If an error occurs, FALSE is returned and unless the function was called as @readgzfile, an error message is printed.

member.name: M:PHP.Library.Zlib.Zlib.ZlibGetCodingType
member.summary: Returns the coding type used for output compression.
member.returns: Possible return values are gzip, deflate, or FALSE.

member.name: M:ComponentAce.Compression.Libs.zlib.SupportClass.ReadInput(System.IO.Stream,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a number of characters from the current source Stream and writes the data to the target array at the specified index.
member.param: The source Stream to read from.
Contains the array of characteres read from the source Stream.
The starting index of the target array.
The maximum number of characters to read from the source Stream.
member.returns: The number of characters read. The number will be less than or equal to count depending on the data available in the source Stream. Returns -1 if the end of the stream is reached.

member.name: M:ComponentAce.Compression.Libs.zlib.SupportClass.ReadInput(System.IO.TextReader,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a number of characters from the current source TextReader and writes the data to the target array at the specified index.
member.param: The source TextReader to read from
Contains the array of characteres read from the source TextReader.
The starting index of the target array.
The maximum number of characters to read from the source TextReader.
member.returns: The number of characters read. The number will be less than or equal to count depending on the data available in the source TextReader. Returns -1 if the end of the stream is reached.

member.summary: Performs the generic zlib stream filter operation.

Current position within the chunk.
Value indicating whether the stream will be closed.
member.returns: Array of available bytes (even empty one). Null on non-critical error.
